website_summaries.verdict: With an extra large cleaning surface, you can use this brush to both scrub and steam-clean tough residue from your grill.
pros: 18" brush with the effectiveness of 3 brushes in one.Heavy-duty stainless steel bristles
Douse brush with water to steam clean hot grill
Cleans burnt-on residue off the whole grate instead of the top
Works on many kinds of grills
cons: Plastic handle is not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Beware !  Loses many, many wire bristles during first 3-4 uses. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brush on March 2nd. It’s been used 3-4 times. Made burgers for a Mother’s Day get together. Luckily I was the one to get the wire broken off the brush in my burger and didn’t swallow it. I went out to look at the grill and to my horror found dozens more broken off wires up against the edges of the grates. Scared the hell out of me. This is ridiculous. Any one of these wires could potentially be a cause to the ER/OR. I’ve used other wire grill brushes before and ever had a problem. This new brush goes in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Schmaker

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the circular brushs
customer_reviews.text: Finally a grill brush that actually cleans the grill. Just last month I ordered one of the latest and greatest brush's that have the little rings of coils. That thing was a junk and only would knock off big chunks. It left all the smut and soot on the grill to stick to my food. This thing actually cleaned decent and is as close to the old school bristle brush's. I upped my original review from 4 to 5 stars since I've used it many times since then. This is the best I've found out there to clean a grill.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brush
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this Kona grill brush and have used it many times. I’ve gotta say that it does a very nice job. I’ve purchased other brushes with fake reviews saying how great they are, only to find out that they are pieces of junk when I received them. The Kona is not one of those cheap brushes with fake reviews. I was pleasantly surprised how stiff the bristles are and how sturdy the handle is. I really like the design of this brush and seems to be well made. This is my favorite grill brush so far.
customer_reviews.author: Trekker

customer_reviews.title: It’s only a matter of time till it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: It works it does its job but the material is cheap that hold the brush. If you grill all the time this won’t hold up. I don’t know why they use cheap plastic to hold the brush it’s only a matter of time till it breaks. You can buy a brush just like this one at walmart for $8-9 dollars but with better material that holds the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Henry wear

customer_reviews.title: Didn't solve the loose bristle problem
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this product would solve the problem of broken bristles on my grill, but it does not. In fact, after very little use it sheds many bristles on my grill which then needs to be carefully inspected prior to use. Very disappointing, and makes me question of there is in fact a grill brush that will solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Maniac

customer_reviews.title: Bristles broke
customer_reviews.text: After only using 10 times the little metal bristles started breaking off, not cool, especially when we noticed after having found one on a hamburger we grilled while eating it. Then went out to the grill and saw a bunch of the little metal bristles scattered on our grill top.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Construction - including the bristles
customer_reviews.text: I was initially torn between this brush and Kona’s other grill brush. It is very high quality product with respect to what it’s made to do - clean your grilling surface. Other grill brushes like those made by Weber are similarly price but in my opinion are not as well made as this brush and feel flimsy. I have had mine for almost three months and use it about every other day. I have not noticed any degradation of the bristles and when you use hot water on the hot surface, I still get a quality deep cleaning. If this brush still functions in a decent manner after six months, I’ll be happy and will probably purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of difference among grill brushes, but in this case there is one definite advantage. The design of this brush allows me to get all the way to the back edge of my grill grates. My old brush has a scraper that prevented me from reaching the back edge of my grates unless I lift them out, which is a pain as I like to heat up my grill before I clean the grates (I have a propane grill with a back wall that my grates rest against).
customer_reviews.author: jmlambion

customer_reviews.title: Good Initially...then
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this was one of the better BBQ grate cleaning tools I've ever used. Then, one day during a pre-grill light cleaning, the plastic handle just snapped right where the brush head meets the handle. The problem is the shank holding the brush head doesn't extend deep enough into the handle. If the manufacturer would extend the shank 3-4" longer into the handle body, the problem would be solved.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Brush!
customer_reviews.text: While I've used many grill brushes before, none of them cleaned up my old grill like this one! I've always use a brush in conjunction with a pumice stone. However, with this brush, I really didn't need the pumice stone. After cleaning all the "stuff" from my grates, it washed up really easy and clean. Never thought I'd get this excited about a grill brush! Next test will be the smoker. I'm having a BBQ island built that will integrate my smoker and a brand new grill. Can't wait to use it! I highly recommend that you get one!
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I have ever used for thorough clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one and the Safe/Clean Grill Brush. Pros: Very sturdy and heavy duty. Almost full coverage including lower faces of grates. Cons: Relatively narrow, so you will be making many passes. This brush is great for those heavy nasty cleanup jobs that you get occasionally. Using the water during cleaning is helpful. If you have lighter/daily cleanup, the Safe/Clean brush may be better for everyday clean up. I have never been concerned about bristles falling off. However, I wipe my grill grate with vegetable oil after each cleaning, so I imagine that mitigates that issue.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good scrubbing/ cleaning action. I got some new parts for my grill and scrubbed up the rest of it with this. Saved me from buying a new grill!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of an article I read. I don't really use wire brushes anymore because of the health hazards, I use a wood paddle. Sometimes though, you need a good stiff brush. This doesn't get under the grates as much as I thought it would based on the description and design, but it works well. After I purchased it, I found out that they sell a bristle less brush that is one continuous piece of metal. I'll check that out next time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in CT

customer_reviews.title: Easiest and sturdiest cleaner I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Great product. it can deep clean or light clean it is all up to you and the pressure to use for cleaning. It is easy and I chose this style because my grates are vertical (up-down) so it naturally cleans well scrubbing that direction. The brush slides perfectly over the grate where it cleans the sides without a whole lot of extra movement. The brush bristles are steel and don't mash/bend like regular brushes. It is light and easy to scrub with for periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: camerola00

customer_reviews.title: Really gets into the grooves of the grill
customer_reviews.text: No. not a 60's reference. Y'know how there are dips in the grill? This really gets into them & cleans up. I had bought one scrubber where the metal coils went left to right on the handle - useless on my grill. A brush like that only works on flat griddles. I scrubbed my grill when it was cold - did a great job. I'm sure it'll do even better when the grill is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Well made BBQ grill brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush makes cleaing off your BBQ after cooking easy and quick. It is nicely made, requiring very little force to get food residue off the grates. This won't remove 100% of what's on the grate, but I don't believe that should be your goal as "seasoning" the grate so things cook well and don't stick is what you're after. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: pksimons

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding grill brush and I would have given it 5 stars, but the plastic handle broke after one year of use. However I like it so much that I am replacing it with another identical brush. Hopefully the manufacturers will read this review and make efforts to add more longevity to their product. Since the plastic in the handle is subjected to high temperatures, it needs to be made out of a sturdier material.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy1

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the grill cleaner has brissels that break off and after it gets broken in. Noone wants to find metal in their food
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a solidly constructed grill brush. The design is superior to other perpendicularly oriented bristle brushes - there is much more surface area to clean the grill per pass, since the 3 bristle lines are oriented parallel to the grill bars. I've only used a few times but this is much superior to any previous grill brush I've used. Will see what the longevity is. Even if it lasts only 1-2 years, it would be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for him for fathers day (so over three months ago) and he loves it. We got a new grill half way though that time and it worked equally well getting the old one clean as keeping the new one clean. The shape of the brush isn't a gimmick, it works very nicely. Try dipping it in water to scrub a hot grill, that works even better!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferLynn

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best grill brush I've ever owned, and I've owned quite a few! This thing is stout and has three rows of stiff, stainless steel brushes. I use it on my smoker and my gas grill. I use it on the cast iron grill in the smoker and on the grills and Grill Grates I use in my gas grill. It gets between the grill bars to clean that stuff that you usually have to use some sort of edge tool to get at. It cleans up nicely with a blast from the hose. I've bought many grill cleaning devices that cost more than this and did not do a good job of cleaning. This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: John W2000

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill Brush
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this brush is. It isn't as easy to use as my old bristle brush, but if you have ceramic grates this is probably the next best thing. It does a good job on the ceramic grates and hasn't damaged them. I'd recommend this to anyone trying to get away from traditional bristle brushes as I think this is as good as you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: This is the single greatest innovation in grilling history since the invention of the grill.
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? It defies all logic that a brush can be this good. I've had it for 4 months now and it looks brand new. No crushed/bent bristles, no burnt ends, just an insanely good brush. Literally one scrub back and forth and the mess is gone on my Weber Genesis II e-345. I had a 50 person cookout Sunday and this brush kept my grates mess-free for the duration. In all seriousness, this brush is truly awesome and worth the price 10x over.
customer_reviews.author: JSplaine62

customer_reviews.title: FOR LARGER GRILLS
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this grill brush after reading reviews but unfortunately it is so large it will not fit inside on the grill to store. I hate to leave it outside on the hooks or my husky will think it's a toy. We have a smaller Weber grill and it is awkward for me to hold and really too large to clean with without two hands gripping it. Great for guys or anyone with large hands and a large grill - but for women or a smaller grill it's not manageable. It does clean good - just too much work to manipulate for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: KLM2

customer_reviews.title: This brush is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is AWESOME!!! I bought this to clean my new grill and love how well it does the job. I purchased a Weber Spirit E-330 and this brush is perfect for cleaning the grates. I follow the guidelines of turning all burners on high to heat the grill, then clean the grates with my Kona 360 Clean Grill Brush and feel confident it is time to start grilling. When I am done grilling, I follow the same procedure of turning all burners on high to let any leftover food burn off and then clean with my brush so that I am prepared for the next grill fest.Overall,this brush is a great asset in my grilling arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing! I use this before and after grilling and my grill still looks like brand new. I’m very glad my friend told me about this especially when it came to leaving no steel fibers on the grill, that sold me instantly. Please don’t hesitate, buy this and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Marquis40

customer_reviews.title: ... it 5 stars cause it feels heavy-duty and looks like it would last
customer_reviews.text: I'LL Give it 5 stars cause it feels heavy-duty and looks like it would last, but to be honest I have not used it yet at this point I'm getting all my barBQ tools together to be ready for the season. I will give a review again once the season gets going cause I grill every day the kitchen is closed once summer starts so this grill brush will be used way more than normal. I hope it can take it and at least last 1 season.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben A.

customer_reviews.title: The best practices that Kona sent to me by email really ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush makes it much easier to get the debris on the sides and joints of the grate than the other brushes I have used. The best practices that Kona sent to me by email really made a difference too. Dipping this brush in water to clean the grill when it's hot is very effective. This brush holds quite a bit of water, which makes the "steam cleaning" quick. My grates have never looked this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P. Shade

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty implement
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at removing crud from my grill. However the handle is surprisingly long - longer than it needs to be for home grill use which makes it a little awkward to use and store. I think it's exactly as described, I just didn't appreciate what it would be like.
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Cleaner for my XL Primo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner for my Primo grill. It certainly doesn't gunk up and it washed out nicely. My grill got cleaner using this than any other product I have tried. I just wish they made a smaller sized one. It is a little large...even for my XL Primo charcoal grill. I have to be careful because there is a felt lining around the grill for a better seal between grill and top cover. But as far as cleaning this is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: dahank

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beast
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast. Other models of grill brushes the bristles flatten. This handle is beefy and makes hard scrubbing comfortable and not feeling like it will break 6 months in and I grill 3 times a week generally. Will buy again if I ever need a new but wonder if will ever wear out. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush I've purchased...ever!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the BEST grill brush I have purchased! Seems like purchase a new brush every summer... I could tell this one was different from the start. First off... it's heavy! There is so much steel on this brush that it breezes through the toughest residue left on my grill. Secondly, it's wide! The three sets of bristles get into the narrow openings on the grill grate and wipes out the grime. Lastly, the handle is sturdy! I can really give it the elbow grease some tough spots need without worrying if the brush will bend, or break! Really love this product! Would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: John Engel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for cast-iron grill grates and griddles.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill brush I have found for large cast-iron and enameled cast-iron grill grates. Normal brushes have difficulty getting between the small spaces in the grates (Weber Q2200) and unless you chip away at the enamel they never really get clean. This brush is fantastic at cleaning the entire surface without damaging the enameled finish. The brush is good at cleaning traditional wired cooking surfaces too, however applying too much pressure can cause the brush to slip between the wires and it's a pain to remove from the hot grate(literally).
customer_reviews.author: UTMorpheus

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for our infrared grill and it does not clean the burnt stuff off near as good as the reviews claim it to work. I’m not sure if it’s due to the bristle length or what but I would definitely try a different brand next time. I’ll update if my review changes as it gets “worn in.”
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Received used brush!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself may or may not be great but I 100% received a used/returned one. Scratches on handle and grease on bubble wrap. Immediate turnoff.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Zafiriou

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get brush after reading about it in the family handyman. Was disappointed when it arrived. Middle brush was distorted and had to be bent back in shape. Hairline crack going down handle. Was really looking forward to this...
customer_reviews.author: jmitchell

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operator
customer_reviews.text: Handle with Care! Will brush can HURT you! And it cleaned the surface of my Weber grill so easily, leaving a very smooth surface free of all the leftovers. I was pleasantly surprised at how smoothly this brush moves on the grill. I've had a lot of brushes over my many years. But, this one is the best "Smooth Operator" I've ever used. Definatley worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sam McClaren

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: The other bbq brush I have are bristles in rows and not really good for cleaning the grates because the bars on the grate would ride between the rows of the brush and not get clean. This brush covers the entire top and sides of the grill bars and really works well. It helps if your grill is warm/hot when using any grill brush. Not the cheapest but works well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good, but handle too short
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do what it should... clean the grill grates. Unfortunately, the handle is a little short for reaching the very back of the grill. At high heat, my grill hits over 600 degrees. Having a short handle burns the heck out of my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: subzerolv

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke. I guess it’s okay for scraping soot/grease off the grates but if anything hard is stuck on it isn’t coming off with this brush. The bristles are too soft so it takes A LOT of elbow grease to get a decent clean with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - Sturdy/heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one! By far one of the best grill brushes I’ve owned. I put a lot of pressure in my grates and have snapped a brush or two. This one is very a sturdy and give a good, deep grate clean. If/when this one gives out I’ll likely replace it with the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFam

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, I used it once and noticed a dime-sized chip of plastic cracked off at the portion where the metal meets the plastic. I'm not sure if it was like then when it arrived or happened after 1 very light use. I notified customer service at Nickle's Arcade via e-mail. They apologized and sent a new one right out too me. Can't ask for better customer service than that. The brush works great and it's backed by people that care.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush. Cleans the grill very well. I have a Weber with cast iron grates. My normal routine is to heat the covered grill then brush it clean prior to using. This brush does the job well, including getting between the slats. I haven't seen any of the bristles coming off as I read some of the folks had this happen. It's a heavy duty design.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Grill Brush That Cuts Through Grease Well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty beastly and does a solid job of cleaning the grill. I destroyed the last grill brush I had so I was in desperate need for a new one. I saw wonderful reviews for a few brushes on Amazon and settled on this one. I was not disappointed. The brush does a fantastic job cutting through any grease or food leftover from cooking. I wish I had this when I first got the grill and not the crappy one that fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jaykron

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fantastic! I had gone through 2 grill brushes in the past 2 years because the bristles would break down and be deemed ineffective. This grill brush is high quality and is showing no signs of wear after many many uses! Also, the customer service behind this company is unreal. I have received three follow-up emails since my purchase that were sent just to make sure we were satisfied with our purchase! Talk about great customer service! I would definitely recommend this brush as well as any of their KONA products, as it truly seems to be a wonderful company!
customer_reviews.author: dbarnard

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Brush Warranty  Fulfillment Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: Very Good grill brush. Get the grill hot, dip brush in water then brush grill. Repeat until you do entire grill. Mine came out looking good. While brush is great, bristles worn-down,(see photo), tried to get replacement under 5yr warranty. 1st told to send picture, which I did. Then told to return item. Item is 17" long. Don't have envelope or box that fir. To go find and purchase packaging, then pay postage, not worth time and cost to replace under warranty for a $15. item. Earlier to buy a new one which is probably why that is a requirement. Too much trouble to get replacement under their warranty
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: reviews got it right
customer_reviews.text: didnt know if I could trust the review, but I did, and am glad I did. perfect. and most importantly, what the review didnt have to report thank god, is that this does not flake bristles. Do the research, cheap ones will flake their metalic bristles, and that is equal to death, this does not.
customer_reviews.author: i dont usually rate apps

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grill brush
customer_reviews.text: I rate this as the best brush I've bought in many years of grilling. We use it on a Weber Spirit II grill. A few passes on the rack and it's clean. I no longer dread the "clean the grill, honey" request. It's sturdy and should last.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well !
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this was going to be a great purchase in the beginning but once I got it and used the brush to clean the grill? It was one of the best grill brushes I have ever owned ! It even got the gunk off that had been there for the last year ! If your on the fence with this brush, give it a try, its sturdy, cleans well, and got to me in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: WestMiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush after two seasons of heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill brush I’ve ever used. I’m impressed by the quality and sturdiness. Ive used it for two seasons now and its still holding up well. It doesn’t seem to leave small particles of steel on the grill like others have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: George Goldie

customer_reviews.title: The Kona works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that does exactly what it advertises. It cleans your grill and does a thorough job. I have cast iron grates in my Big Green Egg and the Kona is so easy to use. Will buy again when this one is done
customer_reviews.author: deadbirdgolf

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. I've never had a grill brush this easy to use and completely as advertised. I've had numerous grill brushes in the past and they all left something behind and fell apart. This brush really works and leaves grill as spotless as possible. Double thumbs up. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Nick Radabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but...
customer_reviews.text: When new this is a great tool. After a couple of uses the tip quickly deforms and is no longer functional. The center, (bottom), cleans well enough but I think that I will go back to the Weber one I had before this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fehrmann

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best grill brush I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best grill brush I have ever owned. Most of them are so cheap you cannot get enough pressure to get the grill really clean. Also, most brushes will not get in between the cracks in the grill or the handle is too short and you burn your hand. This brush does everything well. My first use was after doing some ribs and had BBQ sauce on the grate. After heating it up to 500, I dipped the brush in water as someone had suggested and the steam cleaning combined with the brush made the grill look new again. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great and safe BBQ brush
customer_reviews.text: The BBQ brushes with bristles are a risk to persons if the bristles fall off and end up in your food. Cannot happen with this brush - no bristles. On top of that, it is a great brush for cleaning the BBQ grate.
customer_reviews.author: stevenW

customer_reviews.title: Works great but sheds bristles after a few months of usage.
customer_reviews.text: Sheds bristles after a few months onto the grill surface where it can get into the food! It cleans easily and does a good job on the grill but takes extra time to check for and remove any loose metal bristles from the grill surface before cooking.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Pritt

customer_reviews.title: Bristles too soft?
customer_reviews.text: This brush does not work as well as the Weber. The bristles are too soft, I guess. Also, they do come off, and, if they lodged in my hamburger patty, I would eat them, and then end up having surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Bikermaniac

customer_reviews.title: Cleans faster and better than all the others
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of grilling, and go through 2-3 grill brushes per year because the bristles wear down. I bought this one because of the great reviews and the awesome 5 year guarantee. I've used it 3 times already, and can tell a huge difference from the brushes I've used in the past. The three rows of steel bristles really get down between the grill grates and get it super clean without much effort. With this brush, my grill gets clean a lot faster too. Grill cleaning is never any fun, but something that has to be done. The Kona brush takes a lot of the pain out of this task. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Looses bristles after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I found bristles all over the grill. I purchased the brush about a month and a half ago. I fell in love with it initially but after a few cleanings the bristles gave up and I am afraid to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new BBQ grill. I love the fact that this is a stainless steel brush. It will be as good as my stainless steel pad that I use for the sink. Gets it nice and clean and is great for scraping off the grill grates. Like the long handle. Much needed and appreciated... Suggestion - dip in soapy hot water and then start scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vigliotti

customer_reviews.title: Great grate brush
customer_reviews.text: This was my second brush. I wore out the first one after a year. My grill has a cast iron almost triangular grates and this brush does a great job of cleaning not only on top but does a really great job getting between the grates. Just get one you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Go Tigers !

customer_reviews.title: Solid cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice solid cleaning tool. Works well for basic stainless grill cleaning before cooking. The handle is large for a comfortable grip and reach to the back of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Merril

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Kona 360 Grill Brush was way better than any other grill brush I’ve ever used. After I grilled I used the Kona grill brush with water while the grill was still hot. It worked with the steam to get off all the leftover food & sauce. I recommend this grill brush to anyone who wants their grill to look great after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last for even one season
customer_reviews.text: After two months of BBQ use, it has stopped cleaning the grill well. It now scrapes some burnt stuff away, but not like when we first got it. Pretty disappointing it didn't even last half the season.
customer_reviews.author: J5928

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless brush and very substantial
customer_reviews.text: I can see this brush lasting for a long time . . . very substantial and I don't worry about pushing it too hard, does a great job of cleaning on and around the grates.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no loose bristles here
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well when applied wet with water on hot grill as others suggest. Not seeing any loose bristles after a month or so, and expect none based on construction. Will watch closely, however.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W.

customer_reviews.title: Stout brush
customer_reviews.text: Tried several grill brushes recently and found this design. Gotta say, so far this is the best I've had. Handle is long--which is what I was after. Not much give to it either, meaning you can get on it pretty good without the handle bending out of shape. Brushes get between the grates, and the head shape allows you easily to swipe side-to-side also if you have a flat warming shelf. Handle end has a hole in it for hanging, but it's pretty thick so unless you've got wide hooks you'll probably need a key ring or a leather cord.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Lytton

customer_reviews.title: They finally got it right!
customer_reviews.text: Finally somebody put the brushes going the right way! I have always used the triangle wire brush, but it only rubbed over the very top of the grill, never cleaning very well. This thing is amazing, it cleaned down to the original grill that I hadn't seen in years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For grilling man
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the grill for stubborn food particles. Recommend to use this on stainless setup because grill will break the coating on cast iron and cause rust to form if grill surface is open to water.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: The brush width is wide enough to clean 3 to 4 grids at a time with a few easy strokes. The bristles retained their shape ready
customer_reviews.text: I am a avid griller, smoker and professional chef who loves the cooking and eating part..lol, not the clean up. When I first received my brush, I immediately took it to my grill with the most carbon build up. I was actually surprised how fast this brush cut thru the build up. The brush width is wide enough to clean 3 to 4 grids at a time with a few easy strokes. The bristles retained their shape ready for the next grill. The cost and shipping was is right on for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: keith noriega

customer_reviews.title: This one is amazing, and surprisingly thorough in its cleaning capabilities
customer_reviews.text: With Grilling Season about to begin and my old brush now but a collection of grist and bent bits of metal, a new brush was due. This one is amazing, and surprisingly thorough in its cleaning capabilities. Just hope it lasts more than just one season.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reed

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Grill Brush! Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I had for years been buying the Char-Broil Brush Hawg Grill Brush, all in all I found myself spending lots of money over time buying replacement brush heads. Finally my old grill brush gave out and I couldn't find the replacement brush heads anymore, thankfully when looking for a new brush I found the 360 degree grill brush by Kona. To sum it up it's sturdy, long and perfectly balanced and comfortable when gripping tight to clean your grill. Best of all I cleaned it in record time just by adding a little heat. I recommend this brush if you want to cut down cleaning time and want an obviously durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Grill Brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this grill brush. The longer handle that is angled to allow good cleaning pressure to the grill while cleaning is a benefit. I look forward to using this when the winter weather allows me to get outside with my Weber.
customer_reviews.author: zuzus petals

customer_reviews.title: Good Shtuff
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and if you don't leave it outside all the time it won;t rust on you so keep it well clean and dry so that it lasts for a very long time, okay?
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Mouse

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this grill brush
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this grill brush! I wish I had known about it years ago. I am ordering another one now because tonight I was using it on my grill and the handle snapped off right where the steel wires end inside the handle. I bought this in September 2015 when I got my new Weber Genesis grill. I use the grill at least 3 days each week year round. This brush is used immediately after the food comes off the grill. Buy this brush,you will never I buy another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will do and gets the grill clean. It makes it easy to clean both the top of the rack and hanging food underneath. This is because my grill rack is wide enough for this to fit in between the bars thus clean extra food off of my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks tough as nails!
customer_reviews.text: Since I live where there is now smoke everywhere, I haven't had a chance to go outside to use this, but I'm looking forward to it. It looks ferocious.
customer_reviews.author: giralua

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill brush I have ever used. It is of very high quality and it works efficiently without feeling like I have to scrub the heck out of my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy brush that gets the job done quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying "cheap" grill brushes that lost pieces(handles, bristles, scrapers) and became useless. This brush is simple and effective. The handle is sturdy and it appears that the wires continue a ways in to the handle increasing the durability and effectiveness. It cleans grates throughly with no need to come back and scrape between grates. Update: I used the brush for at least one year before I had to send it to its second life at the cabin cleaning the grill there. Still going strong. I am now using a similar brush by Weber with only one set of bristles instead of three. I miss the old one!
customer_reviews.author: B Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar b que brush
customer_reviews.text: With the design of the bristles, one is able to clean not only the surface in a short time but also the sides of the grate. It allows the cleaning of the small little squares of grate around the outside of grill very effectively
customer_reviews.author: Bernie D, San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Dont forget to use water
customer_reviews.text: GO BUY ONE dip it in water and clean the grill right after your done cooking an its still hot. takes only a little elbow grease for the steam to clean it up like new
customer_reviews.author: Brad Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Great design.  Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a very good job. Replaces a traditional brush that I used for years. I was concerned with the spiral scrubbers but they worked extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new grill and wanted a new grill brush to replace my old ones this KONA brush does a great job in very good time appears to be very durable,I'm a happy costumer
customer_reviews.author: Clement W.

customer_reviews.title: Vertical angle brush is awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: The grill brush is sturdy but I do not at like the angle of the brush. Next time I will not buy this..but other than the uncomfortable angle of the vertical bristles it is usable for a while till I gladly replace it with a grill brush that has more width.
customer_reviews.author: JulieS

customer_reviews.title: Best grill cleaner after multiple products
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, and I agree that adding water for a steam clean is a nice extra step. I did quite of research on various grill cleaners. I first went with the wooden paddle style cleaner, which had a lot of pro's. But just couldn't finish the job. I switched over to this brush, and am very happy. I have also not had to worry about any remaining still bits being left on the grill
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: The best grill brush I have ever owned. It holds up very well and it cleans the top, bottom, and in between the grates when you turn it sideways. Very well made and the bristles don't come out like other ones I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: FISHUNT7

customer_reviews.title: Finally One That Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Every other brush I tried became disfigured fairly fast because they were made with a flat scrubbing surface.The way they had the bristles attached let some come out almost every time I used them - not very safe or healthy. The bristles on this brush fit my grates perfectly on both my gas and charcoal grills. The bristles are tightly wrapped in heavy metal braids so they can't come out in use. It does an excellent job cleaning both v shaped and round shaped grates, getting down between as well as the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: For the cleanest grill around!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this brush for a couple weeks and have used it 3-4 times. It does a GREAT job of cleaning the grill! One of the videos showed cleaning the grill after it is hot using a wet brush. That seems to work the best and leaves my grill spotless. Another thing I really like is that this brush does not seem to accumulate all the grease and gunk like my other brushes did. The only negative for me is that it doesn't have a hook so I can hang it on the grill - - but I will improvise!
customer_reviews.author: FL Bum

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush I've come across in a LONG time
customer_reviews.text: Best grill brush I've come across in a LONG time. the three brush thingees easily space out to match any grill/grate and cleans it very well. Also doesn't remove seasoning from a cast iron grate. That alone is worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: The Badge, the Lesser

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It says 18" and that's accurate, the head is large and makes scraping surface debris a breeze. I was surprised at it's size with the bristles about the size of my hand
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!!
customer_reviews.text: So I know this is just a brush, but what a brush it is!! I have a Charbroil infrared grill with ceramic grates. I have gone through 3 flat grill brushes in 2 years. I can't stress how well this brush cleans! It got down in between the spaces on the grates. It left nothing but a shiny grate! I also love how rugged the brush is. I put a ton of weight on it and it held its shape. I'm sure this brush will hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Hard working brush
customer_reviews.text: The stainless bristles are very nice. Handle is long enough to keep hands safe. I think we will have a long and productive relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Semicolon

customer_reviews.title: The reviews were great and after my husband has used it a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this brush advertised in Family Handyman and went straight to Amazon to check it out. The reviews were great and after my husband has used it a few times - he can attest that they're all true! He appreciates how its designed to get down between our infrared grill grates, how thoroughly it cleans them and the overall experience of using it. We just replaced our grates and this grill brush will help keep them looking nicer longer. We're expecting that once our neighbors see this grill brush, they'll want one! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my smoker/grill looking like new. Gets the grates clean and is easy to clean when done. Heavy duty and seems to be very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Spender

customer_reviews.title: It works great and does it great job every time.
customer_reviews.text: Great brush stainless steal brush cleaning is easy. I am glad that I brought this brush it’s holding up great and does a great job every time.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a grill brush that gets between the grates and the top as well. We used this on our grill after cooking chicken and it worked exceptionally well. I recommend you use while the grill is still warm and if there are stubborn spots I spay on a little soapy water, scrub, and turn on the grill for a few minutes. It is clean again. Of course it is not like brand new, but it is clean and the next meat I grill will not have charcoal tasting residue.
customer_reviews.author: WHR

customer_reviews.title: Got here fast and looks the part!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and haven't used it yet. None the less, it looks tough and should do the job. Report more later. Very fast delivery. Thanks Update, been using it like crazy and it works. Have a rather large grill system and use the KONA Grill Brush at least two times per week. Plus, it is holding up well. Good product would recommend. Again, Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Braun

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Brush That Works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a BBQ grill brush that is up to the task of cleaning my Weber grill. Almost every BBQ brush that I've tried left tiny metal fibers on the grill surface and that just won't do. The Kona brush has what it takes to get my grill looking good after use. I'd encourage you to give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Budd

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the cheapies found at Walmart/Home Depot/Lowes
customer_reviews.text: Very robust and well designed. Used upon receipt and with a bit if water and a hot grill the grates cleaned up very easily. I'll no longer buy the cheap ones Ive been using all my life!
customer_reviews.author: C. Landi

customer_reviews.title: Overall it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it does a great job.. The only drawback Is that the side of the grill rack and bottom do not get full cleaning. It take manuvering the brush to get areas other than just the top of the rack clear and sometimes a different type of grill brush or a putty knife. However this grill brush is very well made and should last several years at least. I am going into my 2nd summer with this brush and there are no issues..
customer_reviews.author: LadyBug

product_meta.title: Kona 360 Clean Grill Brush, 18 inch Best BBQ Grill Brush - Stainless Steel 3-in-1 Grill Cleaner for Effortless Cleaning
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1| Color:Black 

EVER WISH THERE WAS AN EASIER WAY TO CLEAN YOUR GRILL?

Cleaning your grill can be tough! An ordinary grill brush takes a lot of effort and can be painfully frustrating getting more than just the very top clean. I hate seeing all that burnt on grease stuck to the sides of a "just cleaned" grill. And, there's the heat burning your knuckles and the giving up on getting the back corners cleaned.

Those Less Than Stellar BBQ Grill Brush Days Are Gone!

The 360 Degree Clean Grill Brush By Kona allows you to effortlessly clean all sides of your grill grates. Its hard-wired stainless steel bristles cut through the toughest residue without scratching your grill.

Features & Benefits

-Stainless Steel Hard-Wired Bristles
-18" Tough, Weather Resistant Handle
-3 Brushes In 1 Design
-Perfect For All Grill Types, Including Porcelain, Stainless Steel and Infrared
-Stiff Rigid Construction, Yet Light-Weight
-5 Year "No Hassle" Manufactures Limited Warranty.. Manufacturer will repair or replace item for a term of 5 years from date of purchase. Warranty is not transferable and does not cover rust or normal wear and tear.


Enjoy Clean Healthy Eating

The 360 Degree Clean Grill Brush By Kona provides a cleaner, healthier grill surface than other brushes and greatly reduces the risk of bristles ending up in your food.

Money Back Guarantee If you're not happy with our tough BBQ grill brush, we will fix the situation, hassle free.

CLICK "ADD TO CART" NOW - We Won't Be Offering This Amazing Deal For Long! Buy 2 Or More And Get Free Shipping
feature_bullets: SUPER FAST LOW EFFORT GRILL CLEANING - Unique design is 3 brushes in 1! Each stroke is equivalent to 3 strokes of a conventional grill brush. 360° clean, not just the top surface. Quickly removes burnt on residue! A great gift idea. FOR BEST RESULTS: Repeatedly dip brush in water during brushing hot grill to steam clean.
RECOMMENDED FOR ALL GRILL TYPES - Safe for Porcelain, Ceramic, Infrared, Weber, Char-Broil, etc. Keeps your grill looking shiny new!

LONG LASTING SOLID CONSTRUCTION - 60% more rigid tool than a conventional brush. Will not bend or become flimsy. The latest innovation in grill accessories. ♻️ Also Available - Our New Safe/Clean Bristle Free Grill Brush!

THE IDEAL HANDLE LENGTH - 18" is the perfect length for ease of use. Allows the use of both hands with minimal effort. It also keeps your hands from getting burned by keeping them further from the heat. Shorter brushes take way too much effort and longer brushes are too cumbersome.
5 YEAR MANUFACTURERS LIMITED WARRANTY ($24.99 Value) INCLUDED FREE! So you can buy this BBQ grill brush with ABSOLUTE CONFIDENCE. Try it now risk free!
